page.title: 10FARMING ROUND WYDDIAL
page.content: The British Livestock Co. at Wyddial Bury Farm are specialists breeding stock producers.They import and export fresh and frozen semen and embyros for all breeds of stock,but especially cattle,pigs,sheep,horses and goats.The embryo is fertilised at Wyddial.Eight days later it is removed from the host animal and exported,fresh or frozen,depending on its destination.Exports are made to Portugal,Spain,Italy,The Middle East, U.S.S.R.,Hungary,U.S.A.,Nigeria,Kenya, Pakistan,China,Japan,Australia and many other countries.They employ 7 people,one of whom the herdsman lives in the village. Part of Silkmead Farm is occupied by stables where 10 race horses can be trained.
